level.heading: Continuation of ongoing procurement process.
level.text: The Mayor may enter into a contract based upon a solicitation, including a request for proposals, request for qualifications, or request for expressions of interest, issued by the NCRC or the AWC before October 1, 2007.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 2-1225.12.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-138
level.text: For Law 17-138, see notes following ยง 2-1225.11.
